extends Object
implements Response

      • sendRedirect

        public void sendRedirect(String redirect)
                  throws IOException
        Sends a redirect response to the client using the specified redirect URL. Normally, no further data will be written back to the client.
        Specified by:
        sendRedirect in interface Response
        Parameters:
        redirect - the URL to redirect to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error sending the redirect.

      • setContentType

        public void setContentType(String contentType)
        Sets the content type of the response being sent to the client.
        Specified by:
        setContentType in interface Response
        Parameters:
        contentType - a String specifying the MIME type of the content, e.g. text/html.

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(String name,
             String value)
        Sets a response header with the given name and value. If the header had already been set, the new value overwrites the previous one.
        Specified by:
        setHeader in interface Response
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the header
        value - the header value

      • sendError

        public void sendError(int code,
             String description)
               throws IOException
        Specified by:
        sendError in interface Response
        Parameters:
        code - the error code to return
        description - the description of the error
        Throws:
        IOException - an IO exception has occurred trying to send the error
